Class GeoDistanceBuilder

    public class GeoDistanceBuilder
extends AggregationBuilder<GeoDistanceBuilder>
    Builder for the GeoDistance aggregation.

      • addRange

        public GeoDistanceBuilder addRange(String key,
                          double from,
                          double to)
        Add a new range to this aggregation.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to use for this range in the response
        from - the lower bound on the distances, inclusive

      • addRange

        public GeoDistanceBuilder addRange(double from,
                          double to)
        Same as addRange(String, double, double) but the key will be automatically generated based on from and to.

        public GeoDistanceBuilder addUnboundedTo(String key,
                                double to)
        Add a new range with no lower bound.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to use for this range in the response
        to - the upper bound on the distances, exclusive
